name: stern
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 severe, or showing disapproval: a stern look/warning/voice She is her own sternest critic. Journalists received a stern warning not to go anywhere near the battleship.
If something, such as a job, is stern, it is difficult: The country's president is facing the sternest test of his authority since he came to power five years ago.
